name: Kritical Mass
description:
You are a Pilot flying an EXPERIMENTAL CRAFT, the K12, which few can handle.

The HOLY GALACTIC EMPIRE, which has upheld peace throughout the known universe for a millennium, is waning.

A NEW THREAT emerged, dark creatures of the old world, which crossed the borders of this dimension.

CURRENT FEATURES:

*Two levels to give you an idea of what is to come in future updates.

*Seamless Space to Planet Combat

*Fast-paced and action packed shooter

*The Music Slaps

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Join my community on Discord

https://discord.gg/EG2wkT7s

Or follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/lost_in_days
---------------------------------------------------------------------

WS - SPEED

AD - ROLL

MOUSE - ORIENTATION

LEFT MOUSE - SHOOT

MOUSE WHEEL - SWITCH WEAPON

RIGHT MOUSE - AFTERBURNER

V - TOGGLE THIRD PERSON

C - TOGGLE COCKPIT
